plugins.name: Additional Artists Details
plugins.description: This plugin provides specialized album and track variables with artist details for use in tagging and naming scripts.

plugins.name: Additional Artists Variables
plugins.description: This plugin provides specialized album and track variables for use in naming scripts.

description_i18n.de: Dieses Plugin stellt spezielle Album- und Titelvariablen für die Verwendung in Benennungsskripten bereit.
description_i18n.fr: Ce plugin fournit des variables spécialisées pour les albums et les pistes à utiliser dans les scripts de nommage.
